snippet.title: Retrocyclins: a defence against HIV, reawakened after 7 ...
snippet.description: Retrocyclins are genes that protect other primates from HIV but have lain dormant in our genomes for 7 million years. Now, these sleeping guardians are set to awaken.

snippet.title: Why Do We Sneeze?
snippet.description: Sure, they blast out germs and other unwanted intruders, but sneezes have another, just discovered purpose, a new study says.
